notes.title: Lantern Concept
notes.excerpt: Sketch of a lantern market that opens only at blue hour. Vendors trade ideas for light; each flame remembers a wish.

notes.title: Moonwell Memory
notes.excerpt: Nyssa heard the moonwell hum like a chorus. The water held the reflections of choices she hadn't made yet.

notes.title: Sigil Draft
notes.excerpt: Drafting a sigil that loops the protagonist back to the start if spoken aloud. Needs a gentle counter-charm.
